title: Plum Gateway
marks:
Signature, Title, Mark, and Inscription

L margi LLC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in grey: [Plum Gatewa
description: wooden gate in middle ground; woman behind gate attempts to assist young girl in crossing through gate to front; outside, a woman standing near blossoming plum tree at LR, with baby on back, looks on; trees at varying heights in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
